name: Neural Rush
description:
Game made for Multiple Sclerosis Society

Ride the nerve of a person affected by Multiple Sclerosis. Hitting T-cells will make you lose a life and gain a symptom (Tremors, Impaired Vision). Collect pills to regain a life and cure the respective symptom.  

Avoid the T-cells scattered along the nerve fibers and go as far as you can!

Controls:

A - Rotate player left

D - Rotate player right

Space - Jump
